fields.label: Tipas
fields.description: Pasirenkama medija, rodoma virš klausimo.

semantics.label: Užduoties aprašymas
semantics.description: Čia aprašykite savo užduotį. Užduoties aprašymas bus rodomas virš teksto įvesties srities.

semantics.label: Pagalbos tekstas
semantics.description: Šis tekstas turėtų padėti naudotojui pradėti.

semantics.label: Sample solution
semantics.description: You can optionally add a sample solution that's shown after the student created a text. It's called sample solution because there probably is not only one solution.

fields.label: Įvadas
fields.description: You can optionally leave the students some explanations about your example. The explanations will only show up if you add an example, too.
fields.placeholder: Please remember that you were not expected to come up with the exact same solution. It's just a good example.

fields.label: Sample solution text
fields.description: The student will see a "Show solution" button after submitting if you provide some text here.

fields.label: Raktažodis
fields.description: Keyword or phrase to look for. Use an asterisk '*' as a wildcard for one or more characters. Use a slash '/' at the beginning and the end to use a regular expression.

fields.label: Variations
fields.description: Add optional variations for this keyword. Example: For a 'city' add alternatives 'town', 'municipality' etc. Points will be awarded if the user includes any of the specified alternatives.

fields.label: Taškai
fields.description: Points that the user will get if he/she includes this keyword or its alternatives in the answer.

fields.label: Occurrences
fields.description: Define how many occurrences of the keyword or its variations should be awarded with points.

fields.label: Svarbu didžiosios ir mažosios raidės
fields.description: Makes sure the user input has to be exactly the same as the answer.

fields.label: Forgive minor mistakes
fields.description: This will accept minor spelling mistakes (3-9 characters: 1 mistake, more than 9 characters: 2 mistakes).

fields.label: Feedback if keyword included
fields.description: This feedback will be displayed if the user includes this keyword or its alternatives in the answer.

fields.label: Feedback if keyword missing
fields.description: This feedback will be displayed if the user doesn’t include this keyword or its alternatives in the answer.

fields.label: Feedback word shown if keyword included
fields.description: This option allows you to specify which word should be shown in front of your feedback if a keyword was found in the text.

fields.label: Feedback word shown if keyword missing
fields.description: This option allows you to specify which word should be shown in front of your feedback if a keyword was not found in the text.

fields.label: Define custom feedback for any score range
fields.description: Click the "Add range" button to add as many ranges as you need. Example: 0-20% Bad score, 21-91% Average Score, 91-100% Great Score!

semantics.label: Behavioural settings
semantics.description: Šios parinktys leis jums valdyti, kaip veikia užduotis.

fields.label: Minimum number of characters
fields.description: Specify the minimum number of characters that the user must enter.

fields.label: Maximum number of characters
fields.description: Specify the maximum number of characters that the user can enter.

fields.label: Input field size
fields.description: The size of the input field in amount of lines it will cover

fields.label: Enable "Retry"
fields.description: If checked, learners can retry the task.

fields.label: Ignore scoring
fields.description: If checked, learners will only see the feedback that you provided for the keywords, but no score.

fields.label: Points in host environment
fields.description: Used to award points in host environment merely for answering (not shown to learner).

fields.label: Passing percentage
fields.description: Percentage that's necessary for passing

fields.label: Mastering percentage
fields.description: Percentage that's necessary for mastering. Setting the mastering percentage below 100 % will lower the maximum possible score accordingly. It's intended to give some leeway to students, not to "graciously accept" solutions that do not contain all keywords.

fields.label: Override case sensitive
fields.description: This option determines if the "Case sensitive" option will be activated for all keywords.

fields.label: Override forgive mistakes
fields.description: This option determines if the "Forgive mistakes" option will be activated for all keywords.

fields.label: Replacement for line breaks
fields.description: By default, line breaks will be replaced with a space character. If you want to check for line breaks, e.g. in regular expressions, you can set a different replacement here.

semantics.label: Header for panel containing feedback for included/missing keywords
Remaining characters
semantics.description: Message for remaining characters. You can use @chars which will be replaced by the corresponding number.

semantics.label: Not enough characters
semantics.default: You must enter at least @chars characters!
semantics.description: Message to indicate that the text doesn't contain enough characters. You can use @chars which will be replaced by the corresponding number.

semantics.label: Save message
semantics.description: Message indicating that the text has been saved

semantics.label: Your result (not displayed)
semantics.description: Accessibility text used for readspeakers. @score will be replaced by the number of points. @total will be replaced by the maximum possible points.

semantics.label: Navigation message (not displayed)
semantics.default: Navigated to newly included sample solution after textarea.

semantics.label: Mygtuko „Rodyti sprendimą“ pagalbinės technologijos aprašymas
semantics.default: Show the solution. You will be provided with a sample solution.

semantics.label: Assistive technology description for "Retry" button
semantics.default: Retry the task. You can improve your previous answer if the author allowed that.
